prompt_base: captivating blue eyes, long smooth turquoise teal hair, modern casual attire, yellow jacket, blue pants, black undershirt, orange boots, pink headband
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, individual hair strands, natural fabric textures, detailed jacket design, sharp focus on pink headband
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic, neon blue, wig, deformed, blurry clothes, dull colors
